about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hello! I'm a developer passionate about creating solutions that solve real problems. My journey began with a curiosity to understand how things work on the web and evolved into building complex applications.
about.p2: With experience in <1>Full Stack</1> development, I feel comfortable navigating both front-end and back-end. I enjoy working with modern technologies and I'm always looking to learn new tools to improve my workflow.
about.p3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new Linux distributions, playing chess, or researching interface design.

tcc.short: Application developed for the Final Course Project.
tcc.full: Complete project developed as part of the course completion requirements. Focused on solving a real problem using modern technologies and development best practices.

tcc_api.short: Python Backend API supporting the TCC application.
tcc_api.full: Robust API built with Flask to manage data and business rules for the TCC application. Includes authentication, RESTful endpoints, and database integration.

vendas.short: System for sales management and control.
vendas.full: Application focused on the commercial sector, allowing management of sales, products, and potentially inventory and customer control.

dile.full: Development spanning frontend and backend, demonstrating complete integration between application layers and data flow.

juros.full: Tool developed to assist with interest calculations and financial projections in a quick and intuitive way.

portfolio.full: A showcase of my skills, projects, and experience as a Full Stack Developer, built using modern web technologies.
